title: Swiggy Instamart won’t replace/return this damaged/bulging can which is unfit for consumption, please tell what to do?
selftext: There chat is useless they just say we have shared your feedback and can’t help you with this. I can’t consume this can as it is bulging from bottom and can’t even stand on flat surface,
comments: I rarely drink soda and when I do, i like this one :/ it sure is my fault ordering from swiggy
They put it in the freezer.
I got plenty of coke cans like these, they are alright for consumption , if it's not ruptured or it's not expired

Hey OP 
It's alright to drink then. When you put soda cans in the freezer they bulge out.
It happened to me 4 days ago.
